name: Mission Hell: A Retro Platform Gaming Experience (Canceled)
blurb: Mission Hell is a retro-platform game that combines elements of science fiction with World War II. Think Wolfenstein meets Castlevania.

• You will be made into a playable character, a custom-made and personalized version of the game for you, where you can have a say in some of your endings, available weapons, and foes.
• You will get to design and name a monster/demon/ghoul. You get to design its looks, its attacks, and how difficult it will be to defeat. 
• Your name will be put in the credits as a Platinum Backer. 
• A one-of-a-kind Movie poster design of Mission Hell that incorporates YOUR character into it, as well as the enemies you designed. Think along the lines of 1980's epicness. 
• A one of a kind Mission Hell t-shirt with YOUR character on it (S, M, L, XL, XXL)
• Your rank badge will be General
